subtests.name: Tests for parser inserted controls
[BUTTON] Basic form association - control with no form attribute is associated with ancestor
[BUTTON] Form owner is reset to null when control's form attribute is set to an ID that does not exist in the document
[BUTTON] Control whose form attribute is an empty string has no form owner
[BUTTON] Control whose form attribute is an empty string has no form owner even when form with empty attribute is present
[BUTTON] Control's form attribute must be a case sensitive match for the form's id
[BUTTON] Setting the form attribute of a control to the id of a non-ancestor form works
[BUTTON] Removing form id from a control resets the form owner to ancestor
[BUTTON] Removing the form owner of a control with form attribute resets the form owner to null
[BUTTON] Changing form attibute of control resets form owner to correct form
[BUTTON] Moving a control with form attribute within the document does not change the form owner
[BUTTON] When the id of a non-ancestor form changes from not being a match for the form attribute to being a match, the control's form owner is reset
[BUTTON] When form element with same ID as the control's form attribute is inserted earlier in tree order, the form owner is changed to the inserted form
[BUTTON] When non-form element with same ID as the control's form attribute is inserted earlier in tree order, the control does not have a form owner
[BUTTON] A control that is not in the document but has the form attribute set is associated with the nearest ancestor form if one exists

[FIELDSET] Control whose form attribute is an empty string has no form owner even when form with empty attribute is present

[FIELDSET] When non-form element with same ID as the control's form attribute is inserted earlier in tree order, the control does not have a form owner
[FIELDSET] A control that is not in the document but has the form attribute set is associated with the nearest ancestor form if one exists
